statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

articles.headline: What is the best start to a season in NBA history?
articles.description: The Golden State Warriors achieved the best start to a season in NBA history. Which other teams make the list? Check out more hot streaks now.

images.name: Stephen Curry 160530 [608x342] - Copy
images.caption: The 2025-16 Golden State Warriors hold the record for the best start to a season in NBA history.

articles.headline: Betting buzz: End of LeBron's 10-point streak costly for some bettors, relief for others
articles.description: All good things must come to an end, even LeBron James' 18-year-long streak.

images.name: LeBron James [1296x729]
images.caption: LeBron James NBA-record streak of 1,297 regular-season games with at least 10 points came to an end on Thursday.
images.credit: (Photo by Vaughn Ridley/NBAE via Getty Images)

images.name: Patriots [1296x729]
images.caption: Entering the season, the Patriots were +145 to make the playoffs -- now, they're one of the most bet teams to win the Super Bowl, with the Chicago Bears taking the most wagers overall.
images.alt: TreVeyon Henderson #32 of the New England Patriots races to the outside during a game between the New England Patriots and the New York Giants on December 1, 2025, at Gillette Stadium in Foxborough, Massachusetts.

images.name: Stephen A.: It'll be bad if Shedeur 'stinks up the joint' in first start
images.caption: Stephen A. Smith questions why the Browns didn't prepare Shedeur Sanders more for his NFL debut and talks about the "immense pressure" on Sanders.

articles.headline: Fantasy basketball picks, DFS and betting tips for Friday's NBA games
articles.description: Andre Snellings breaks down Friday's NBA games and offers his top fantasy streamers as well as his favorite bets and DFS plays.

images.name: Quentin Grimes [1296x729]
images.caption: Quentin Grimes has averaged 36 minutes per game over his past ten games.

images.name: Ryan Nembhard gets the basket plus the foul
images.caption: Ryan Nembhard gets the hoop and the harm

articles.headline: Magic's Paolo Banchero (groin) to return Friday vs. Heat
articles.description: Magic forward Paolo Banchero is set to return Friday night against the Heat after missing the past 10 games with a groin strain.

images.name: Paolo Banchero [600x400]
images.caption: Paolo Banchero leads the Magic against the Hawks, two teams with very similar regular season records.
images.alt: Paolo Banchero #5 of the Orlando Magic celebrates against the Washington Wizards during the second half at Capital One Arena on March 21, 2025 in Washington, DC.

images.name: Paolo Banchero somehow gets the and-1 to fall
images.caption: Paolo Banchero somehow gets the and-1 to fall

articles.headline: Stephen A.: LeBron's winning pass a perfect example why he's a top-2 player
articles.description: Stephen A. Smith credits LeBron James for ignoring his double-digit scoring streak and passing to Rui Hachimura for the winning 3-pointer.

images.name: Stephen A.: LeBron's winning pass a perfect example why he's a top-2 player
images.caption: Stephen A. Smith credits LeBron James for ignoring his double-digit scoring streak and passing to Rui Hachimura for the winning 3-pointer.

articles.headline: Latest episodes of Brian Windhorst's 'The Hoop Collective' podcast
articles.description: From breaking news to the latest intel from around the NBA, here are the biggest highlights from Brian Windhorst's "The Hoop Collective" podcast.

images.name: Brian Windhorst on the ESPN set during Round 2 of the 2025 NBA draft. [608x342]
images.caption: Brian Windhorst on the ESPN set during Round 2 of the 2025 NBA draft.

images.name: Stephen A.: The Bucks should trade Giannis
images.caption: Stephen A. Smith explains why it's time for the Bucks and Giannis Antetokounmpo to part ways.
